name: taxonomy_validation
description: Tests NCBI taxonomy validation including abbreviations and typos
notes: E. coli should be flagged as abbreviation → Escherichia coli
B. fragilis should be flagged as abbreviation → Bacteroides fragilis
C. diff should be flagged as abbreviation → Clostridioides difficile
Pseudomonas aeroginosa is a TYPO → Pseudomonas aeruginosa
human/mouse are common names that may be standardized
H. sapiens is abbreviation for Homo sapiens
